summary: This is a publicly filed version of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's response opposing Jeffrey Epstein's bail motion, submitted by the Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit. It appears to be a government opposition to a bail motion with exhibits.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the government's opposition to bail motion, indicating he is seeking release pending trial.

events.title: Government Files Opposition to Epstein's Bail Motion
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York files a publicly filed version of their response opposing Jeffrey Epstein's motion for bail.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York opposed Jeffrey Epstein's bail motion on July 12, 2019.
The filing was submitted by the Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit.
The document is a publicly filed version of the government's opposition, indicating it is part of the public court record.
